answers.answer: Ask your parent to make an appointment with your family doctor, or other health practitioner, for a checkup or for "male issues", and during your visit, explain your symptoms.  I think it would be best to get this checked out sooner than later.

question: Hello I'm 16 5ft8" and I don't have any diabetes, blood pressure or anything  . I'm suffering from retrograde ejacuation.Should I leave it and care after I turn 18 or will it become untreatable if left untreated till I turn 18 or 20. Because I don't feel right to raise this issue to my parents now
title: About retrograde ejacuation.
